concept.title: Hadoop FS
concept.shortdesc: The Hadoop FS destination writes data to a Hadoop file system. You can write delimited or JSON data to flat files or Hadoop sequence files.

conbody.p: When you configure a Hadoop FS destination, you define the output directory template. Hadoop FS creates output directories based the template and writes records to the directories based on the specified time basis - the time that a record is processed or the time associated with the record.
